job.name: Azure_Blob_Storage
job.description: Import data from (or export data to) Azure Blob Storage.

task.name: export_to_azure_blob
task.description: This task allows to export data to Azure Blob storage. It requires the following third-party credentials: STORAGE_ACCOUNT and ACCOUNT_KEY. Please refer to the User documentation to learn how to add third-party credentials. It uses the following variables: $INPUT_PATH (optional) is the local relative path in the data space from which we upload file(s). INPUT_PATH can contain either a path to a file, a directory terminated by / or an empty value for the root. $CONTAINER_NAME (required) is a new or an existing container name under which your uploaded data will be stored. $BLOB_NAME (optional) is the blob name or the directory to which file(s) are uploaded. It can be empty if the INPUT_PATH contains a path to a directory.

variable.name: TRANSFER_DIRECTIVE
variable.model: PA:SPEL(! ( variables['INPUT_PATH'].endsWith('/') || variables['INPUT_PATH'].isEmpty() ? variables['TRANSFER_DIRECTIVE'] = variables['INPUT_PATH'] + '**' : variables['TRANSFER_DIRECTIVE'] = variables['INPUT_PATH']).isEmpty())

task.name: import_from_azure_blob
task.description: This task allows to import data from Azure Blob storage. It requires the following third-party credentials: STORAGE_ACCOUNT and ACCOUNT_KEY. Please refer to the User documentation to learn how to add third-party credentials. It uses the following variables: $OUTPUT_PATH (optional) is the local relative path in the data space in which the downloaded data are stored. OUTPUT_PATH can contain either a path to a file, a directory terminated by / or an empty value for the root. $CONTAINER_NAME (required) is an existing container name from which you download blob(s). $BLOB_NAME (optional) is the blob name to be downloaded. If it is empty, the entire container is downloaded.

variable.name: TRANSFER_DIRECTIVE
variable.model: PA:SPEL(! ( variables['OUTPUT_PATH'].endsWith('/') || variables['OUTPUT_PATH'].isEmpty() ? variables['TRANSFER_DIRECTIVE'] = variables['OUTPUT_PATH'] + '**' : variables['TRANSFER_DIRECTIVE'] = variables['OUTPUT_PATH']).isEmpty())
